name: Vineet Shukla
body:
### Professional Highlights * Experience delivering products from ideation phase in both web & mobile space on latest concepts * Experience executing visioning exercises with multiple stakeholders at different levels (both internal and external) * Experience working closely with SMEs to develop products * Experience working on large scale distributed agile projects * Proven ability to collaborate with multiple stakeholders across different departments * Experience consulting clients and internal teams on agile practices and product roadmap * Experience managing both T&M and Fixed Price projects * Proven PM skills: from creating project plans to leading teams, consistently meeting deadlines and delivering business values * Passion for keeping up with emerging trends * Experience in managing opportunities (pre-sales activities) from different regions * Experience working with start-ups, SMEs and large corporations * Experience working in multiple countries (US, UK, India, Brazil & Singapore) ###Professional Skills Product Management : Advanced Business Analysis : Expert Scope Management : Advanced Agile Practices : Expert Stakeholder Management : Advanced Project Management : Advanced Opportunity Management : Expert Portfolio Management : Beginner Technical Know-how : Intermediate ###Experience * ThoughtWorks Technologies Gurgaon January 2009 – till date * Enzen Technologies, Bangalore October 2007 – January 2009 * Tata Consultancy Services, Bangalore October 2006 – October 2007 * Wipro Technologies, Bangalore September 2004 – October 2006 * KCC, Bangalore September 2003 – September 2004 ###Educational Qualifications PGDMM: Bangalore University
MSc. IT: Kuvempu University
BCA: Bangalore University
###Passport details Passport Number: F3175101
Passport Expiry Date: 15th June 2015
Have valid B1 and UK ICT Tier 2 visas
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
